channel.title: Fraud on David Trumbell
channel.description: Recent content in Fraud on David Trumbell

item.title: Fraud on Ebay
item.description: Recently, I upgraded my iPhone from a 3G to a 3GS and was planning on selling the 3G on Ebay. After listing it then going through the bidding process, a user named “charlesgaulle” had won. Immediately after the auction ended I noticed that this person was from France and my auction explicitly stated that this was to only be sold to someone living in the UK. Also, the person’s name (Branson Jean) doesn’t even match the username, which is when I started getting suspicious.
